title: Emma’s Request
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Maki-chan~, the CD you lent me was really wonderful. Thank you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s good, right? They’re one of my favorite musician<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. They have a very gentle tone huh…. Eh? Heeeh~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What? Is there something on my face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm…. Maki-chan, are you not getting enough sleep? You have some bags under your eyes, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ah, I have a mock exam coming up soon, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see. You’re studying a lot huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>A lot…. Well, it’s at least more than usual<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Maki-chan…. Here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>A lap pillow! Kanata-chan said that even if you use my lap pillow just for a moment, you’ll see great results. So, won’t you try taking a nap on it for 15 minutes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….I don’t get it. Well, I get it but…. It’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I want to thank you, Maki-chan. Since you’re tired, I want to at least help ease that fatigue away…. Please<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Why are you pleading, Emma…. Alright, just for 5 minutes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Sure♪ Come here-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Don’t you ever tell anyone about this, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
